author: {'steamid': '76561198028238607', 'num_games_owned': 609, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 797, 'last_played': 1608908263}
review:
Such a wonderfully wholesome and cute VN! The story is nothing too serious and very lighthearted. It has great characters, very cute moments, and is one of my favorite romance VN's i've read. 
I can't recommend it enough if you want something cute and lighthearted to read! 
Disclaimer: It does have some 18+ scenes but I think they are handled well and were not written as a joke or just to pander. My biggest pet peeve is pointless lewd stuff but I think this one handles it well.

Also fun fact: Rita (who voices Koba Youka, as well as did a few songs for the soundtrack and Ai Ai Ai song that I love) also did music for the KEY visual novel Littler busters which is another one i'd highly recommend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198222139420', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4111, 'last_played': 1513523897}
review:
This is one of my all-time favourite visual novels. I'd recommend it to anyone play, providing it's okay for them to see partial nudity. There's more than one story here, as you see the lives of multiple female characters as they interact with their daily lives, become closer, and even see stories intersect at times. The characters are all endearing, and it's nice to see how their relationships develop.

There are 18+ scenes, but unlike most visual novels with over-the-top 18+ scenes, with characters that're supposed to know nothing about the topic seem to initiate full-blown professional moves, this one is actually done with care and decency. Which is why, unlike how I normally dislike this sort of material when engaging with visual novels, I liked it here. It utilised these scenes and made them feel natural within the story, so you needn't worry about it 'going too far' or being distracting. So I'd say, if this sort of thing bothers you, it shouldn't be a problem here. Unless you were going into this visual novel for this type of thing, in which case you likely will be disappointed.

It's a fairly long visual novel, but I admit I'm not the fastest reader so it may not take you as long as my record displays. I found this one in particular to be engaging throughout, and I found myself feeling all sorts of emotions, from happiness, to sadness, and even occasionally anger. You will feel a lot playing through this.

I can't quite remember the music from this anymore since it's been a long time since I played it and thus cannot comment on it, though I do recall liking it. Aside from the visual novel itself, there's also drama CDs to listen to once you complete this, so if you're after more content - which doesn't cost much at all - then this would definitely be a good decision. There's also a short continuation manga following different characters, but I personally didn't enjoy this very much and wouldn't recommend it. Still, I thought I should bring it up for those that're desperate for more.

I'm probably forgetting to talk about some things but these are the things that I wanted to bring up, currently. I have played a fair number of visual novels and can't stress enough just how good this one is; how sweet and lovely it is to experience this one. Like I said initially, I recommend anyone to play this one, whether fans of visual novels or not - especially if you're fans, though. I hope you all enjoy experiencing this visual novel and take care.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262952897', 'num_games_owned': 3879, 'num_reviews': 822, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1622620336}
review:
[h1]百合屋上百合灵
百合树下你和我
百合乡里来百合
欢乐多又多[/h1]
[url= https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/2309404330613380376839] 全语音版百合灵汉化补丁 [/url]
《屋上的百合灵》是Liar-soft制作的成人校园百合恋爱群像AVG，讲述被过往纠缠着的少女结奈与两名百合灵的相遇后，忙碌奔波于为百合情侣秘密牵线，生活逐渐充实，朋友越来越多，属于自己的恋情也开始绽放的温馨故事。游戏以日程表的形式分章节叙事，推进主线后可自由选择支线顺序；多达七对CP的故事同时进行，鲜明的人物形象和各有看点的恋爱进展生动有趣。游戏画风柔和，UI设计出色，通关后另有番外剧情，全语音DLC让作品更具魅力。

[h1]前言[/h1]
Liar-soft，即骗子社，是驰名业界的良心会社，知名的作品有跑路前的星空流星担当剧本的《Forest》、《腐姬》、《SEVEN-BRIDGE》等；桜井光担当剧本的蒸汽朋克系列苍天、赫炎（和猫之日合作发行了中文版）、漆黑、白光、紫影、黄雷和小说为载体的灰烬，可惜绯星和无色咕咕咕了；20年和《ATRI -My Dear Moments-》一起由ANIPLEX发行的《徒花异谭》的剧本则是由海原望负责，风头完全被ATRI盖住了；最近的则是一人全役包圆企画原画剧本的七星電灯的《BETA-SIXDOUZE》……

由睦月たたら负责的本作完全属于百合向，虽然每一对情侣都只有一次H，成人向的CG也并不多，但恋情萌芽与进展到这一步的过程在日程表的日常剧情中描写十分细致，超神辅助远见结奈在百合灵的“诅咒威胁”下忙前忙后也令人感慨万分。

[h1]游戏演出[/h1]
本作标题画面会随机播放角色之一的台词，进入日程表中所有的主线、支线、番外都有着专属的可爱标识，CG则张贴在日程表一侧（可惜ED的CG没有贴上去）。主线以红蓝小熊贴纸区分，支线则以咬过的樱桃区分，番外则是苹果，洋溢着青春的气息，随着节奏欢快的音乐跃动。

游戏美术风格则给人青涩纯洁之感，选项完全不影响剧情发展，打开自动放映即可获得最佳游玩体验。同一CP的剧情会自动标记，无论是按时间顺序还是一对一对推进剧情都没问题。

[h1]剧情描写[/h1]
游戏中除了百合灵，还有6对CP，其中又有两对有着恪守朋友身份的第三人。百合灵纱织和惠是一切的源头，二人相爱却没有结合的知识，意外发现了能够接触的人类远见结奈，就此缠上了她，请求帮助学校中的情侣顺利恋爱，为了二人的百合乡里能够学习到H的知识而努力。因此，学妹与前辈、老师与学生、不良与风纪委员、部长与副部等情侣组合依次出现在了主角面前。此外，还有广播部三人的友谊怪圈，和主角身边的妹妹与挚友。百合灵之间谎言与沉默的爱恋，前辈分清怯懦与热心的区别，老师释然过去的介怀，主角放下内心的负担，又生出对亲情与爱情的迷惘……剧情对少女们的心理描写十分细腻。两盏电灯泡也都像结奈为其他情侣所做的那样支援着好友的恋情。日常剧情和番外剧情则更进一步地完善了各个角色的形象，喜爱百合的玩家一定不要忘记游玩番外！

[h1]结语[/h1]
本作作为百合作品十分优秀，糖分充足，是百合厨无法拒绝的一作，也是一般玩家入坑的上上之选，还有质量非常高的汉化，十分推荐！

[quote]
[b][u] ❀书以一家之言🌸而荐一人之好❀ [/u][/b]

❀欢迎→🌸 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33500409/]月骨星魂 [/url]❀←关注~❀
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561199128619529', 'num_games_owned': 585, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 1872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1631460276}
review:
本作我愿称之为CP粉模拟器。故事发生在一个女子高中，女主偶然间发现学校天台上有两个意外去世的学生地缚灵，她们既无法离开学校也不能去投胎，而让她们往生的办法就是完成她们的心愿，撮合校内一对又一对有情人。

生动的角色塑造，对百合恋情的讨论深度，还有独特的游戏系统，都是我强烈推荐的优点。而且不仅仅只有爱情线写得好，友情线也写得很好，所有角色之间的友情互动都写得很好。虽然是校园背景的百合恋爱游戏，但是角色们讨论的有关同性恋情的顾虑和疑问都非常现实，思考方式很成熟，不会让人产生这些人只是在学校里谈着玩玩的幼稚感觉。女主和幽灵们助攻CP的骚操作如同老母猪戴胸罩，一套一套又一套，我边玩边复读太牛X了，作为按头CP党实在太有代入感了，女主远见结奈我滴超人！美中不足是女主的官配看上去太小了我不喜欢，还没有阿野的线，但是瑕不掩瑜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198942127168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5060, 'last_played': 1629082053}
review:
Easily one of the best visual novels I have ever played. The artwork is beautiful, it's extremely well written and the premise is really fun. It is a linear story with no branching plot lines, there are a few choices, but they won't change the ending. If that bothers you, maybe you won't enjoy it as much, but the writing is so good it more than makes up for it for me. It's able to juggle multiple plot points at the same time without being overwhelming.

One of the main problems I usually have with visual novels is the pacing. When people go from strangers to lovers in a matter of days it really takes me out of it, but this vn takes about six months. The relationships have time to build realistically, and the game's calendar system attaches each scene to a specific date, so you know exactly how much time has passed between each event, you can also go back and reread previous scenes whenever you want, which is really convenient. But what makes kindred spirits really unique, is that it gives you the scenes from the perspective of multiple different characters. It really helps you get into everyone's heads, and gives you a complete view of the situation.

The characters are all very fleshed out and likable. I highly recommend the "full chorus" dlc which includes all the voice acting. It will cost you a few extra bucks, but hearing all their voices adds so much character. (And it will help you pronounce their names.) Though it is only in Japanese, so be aware of that if you prefer dubs. The character writing is amazing. These girls actually look and act like real teenagers. All the things they struggle with are very believable for their age.

And yes before you ask there are uncensored sex scenes. But honestly, they're more intimate and romantic than outright sexy. Unlike most visual novels I've seen, the sex is actually used to develop the characters and bring them closer. If you removed all the actual sex and just kept the dialog, it would still be great. 

It's an easy 9 out of 10 for me. If you have any interest in yuri anime or visual novels you definitely can't miss out on this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002826497', 'num_games_owned': 611, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 3884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3854, 'last_played': 1621397450}
review:
After my second time going through I figured i should contribute some of my own praise towards this wonderful VN. It's super sweet and fun to watch the girls as their relationships progress.

A lot of love was poured into this and will forever be one of my favorite VN. There's a few nsfw portions as well, but it only makes up maybe like 2% of the entire game(one of each couple), so don't fret too much if that's the part holding you back from trying it. Nothing really explicit.

This isn't my first time going through and it definitely won't be my last!

10/10! Definitely worth the price on sale or not!

Edit: For the people who bought the Full Chorus, the 10 extra drama cd's are in the game's local files, and not actually in the game itself. Took me awhile before I found them.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997085630', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2279, 'last_played': 1626549107}
review: Great yuri romance visual novel with a likable cast. Has a pretty light-hearted tone, but also delves into some real issues when it comes to same-sex relationships. Has some good variety with plenty of different couples, while mostly avoiding the common anime tropes. There's some adult content but it's not overly raunchy, and more than anything, Kindred Spirits is a wholesome experience that focuses on building a relationship. Recommended to anyone who likes yuri and/or romance novels.

author: {'steamid': '76561199001646289', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1715, 'last_played': 1616855865}
review:
推完了，可以说是非常感动了，说点感想。
1.远见结奈，我的超人！
2.摇滚组太甜了，还有专属插曲，牌面！学园祭表白那里真的燃起来了,太感动了呜呜呜呜。真的想不到爱来原来是这么逗的人，双向暗恋赛高！（我是不是剧透了）
3.三人组也好甜，雨中相合伞告白甜炸了。三人之间的感情让我想到了志水老贼，而且我还要拉踩，这不写的比花冬好？（划掉）
4.觉得主角组突兀的可以多玩玩后续的附赠剧情，比奈的戏份几乎全在那里了。比奈真的是小天使啊，斯哈斯哈。但是结奈啊，炼铜还是不好的，桐也是，说你呢！
5.故事形式和人物塑造就不用再吹了吧，真的每个角色都有让人出乎意料的地方。一开始觉得小牧她们组虽然戏份挺多但是形象没立起来，结果到骑士那段就彻底颠覆了认识诶，声优辛苦了。
6.R18只有上半身，不够涩。不得不说其实也算的上是优点了，至少不突兀也不让人觉得不适，冲是没法冲，全程姨母笑就完了。听说还是steam上第一个不用打补丁就能原汁原味体验的R18，针不戳。
7.最后，怎么能没有阿野线？？？阿野！阿野！我的阿野呜呜呜呜呜呜。阿野阿野阿野阿野！我要阿野线啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊我天国的阿野线呜呜呜。
以上，大家晚安，下次见！下次见哦。

author: {'steamid': '76561198846802860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1726, 'last_played': 1687509715}

author: {'steamid': '76561198844206094', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1066, 'last_played': 1619646678}
review:
作为一名有着十几年男性向galgame游戏史的女玩家，本作是我玩过的为数不多的百合游戏。
当初购买的理由，一是口碑不错，二是有mac版本。mac用户表示，有mac版本这点对日本厂商的视觉小说来说还挺宝贵的。与之对比，欧美人制作的VN普遍是跨平台的。
一遍看下来，感觉不错。视角和游戏系统有特色这个就不说了，另一大感触是这是少数我并不反感其H-scene的黄色游戏。作为对刺激的声音和画面并不感冒的玩家，生平玩过的大部分有18禁元素的游戏，我都是一路快进过H-scene的，并且时常觉得H-scene突兀，为了服务想撸的玩家而H，和游戏的其他部分不能自然结合（例子，key社早期游戏中的H，innocent grey早期游戏中的某些H，毫无准备忽然就脱光光开始搞了，那种感觉）。本作，完全不同，首先剧情的大框架让玩家有心理准备不会被突然雷到，然后整个过程是情到浓时自然而然的发展，表现的方式也不让人反感，没有porn的感觉！
还有一个优点就是主角是有血有肉的，不是工具人，这点和后宫作品中的白板猪脚区别很大。
然后剧情的氛围某种程度上和《终将成为你》类似，普通校园生活，全员人美心善的女学生，甜而不腻，好评！
唯一觉得可能值得商榷的地方，是师生恋。尽管本作中的师生恋是甜蜜的，我觉得师生恋的伦理问题大概还是不能回避的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198977407760', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 539, 'last_played': 1615914084}
review:

忙碌一天之后，看一看百合灵，心灵被治愈了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198183946461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1615361177}
review:
Добро пожаловать в Kindred Spirits on the Roof!

Вас ждут:
☑ повторяющиеся мысли в диалогах
☑ из раза в раз героини говорят одно и то же в разных местах сюжета
☑ повторение тех же диалогов, но другими словами
☑ одинаковые копирующие друг друга реплики встречаются в разных сценках игры  

Баги:
☐ Эта игра и есть баг
☐ Много, но они не мешают основному геймплею
☐ Игрушка старая, будьте благодарны, что она без трепыханий запускается на 10-ой винде
☐ Иногда попадаются
☐ Не баги, а фичи
☐ Всё продумано до мелочей
☑ Единственный баг этой визуальной новеллы — сюжет 

Что по механикам?
☐ Детективные механики 
(могли бы быть, они бы вписывались в сюжет, но нет)
☐ Классические для визуальных новелл решения с последствиями 
(в Kindred Spirits on the Roof решения ничего не значат)
☐ В этой игре можно делать хоть что-то кроме чтения 
(а ведь во многих визуальных новеллах есть выборы и разветвлённый сюжет, как в School Days, инвентарь как в The Pillars of Earth, мини-игры, как в Dream Daddy)

Темы и архетипы:
☐ Круговорот жизни
☐ Синтоизм
☑ Трогательная первая любовь
☐ Красота мелочей жизни
☐ История метафорична, и каждый может понять её по-своему
☑ Не ждите многого, никакой пищи для размышлений в этой игре нет, только милая неуверенная романтика

Графика:
☐ Сделано на коленке
☐ Пиксельная
☐ Плохо
☐ Среднячок
☑ Милая!💖
☐ Сделано на коленке очень талантливым школьником
☐ Шедевр

Данное произведение окунёт вас в бесконечное однообразие:
☑ Одинаковых сцен, которые приходится проходить по несколько раз от лица разных героинь
☑ Нудных диалогов про экзамены и почти религиозных повторов от каждой героини о том, как важно хорошо учиться, хотя это никак не коррелирует с сюжетом
☑ Одной-единственной песни, которая стоит на повторе в большинстве сцен этой игры (спасибо разработчи_цам за возможность отключить музыку)

Брать?
☑ Лучше дождаться скидки

author: {'steamid': '76561198357614251', 'num_games_owned': 3679, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1613080755}
review:
[h1] 若这辈子只能玩一款百合游戏，那必须是《屋上的百合灵》！[/h1]
说起《屋上的百合灵》，得先说说她的制作组：liar soft 社。这家制作公司，虽然名气一直不大，但可以说是业内少有的几个几乎不关注经济收益，只注重游戏本身创作的良心会社。早些年liar soft 会社被型月社挖走了不少人才，导致人员流失严重。我个人也是型月的头号粉丝，所以在这里很难做评价，只能说心情有些复杂。她们家的作品每一部都透着一股浓浓的文艺范儿，缺少社保内容，缺少明星向热点，总是致力于向读者讲好每一个爱情故事，为此甚至还创立了一个姊妹公司：rail soft社。

说起来让人有些哭笑不得，liar soft 会社惨淡经营了20多年，从来没有一部作品卖火过。非要说之前有什么名气较大的作品，大概只能算得上《腐姬》和《赫炎的印加诺克》了，虽然我知道你们很多小可爱也不知道《腐姬》与《赫炎》（小声哔哔）……近几年，liar soft 社听说倒是傍上了A社和MG这两个大佬，作品一如既往注重讲好故事，一如既往不想发社保，也一如既往卖的不火，不过确实在经费充足的背景下，作品的格调也得到进一步提升。而这一部《Kindred Spirits on the Roof（屋上的百合灵）》，便是大佬MG联合liar soft 社在Steam上发行的原作升级版。至于她们家这从来不卖肉的贞洁烈妇作风是怎么在20多年的风风雨雨中，坚持货到了今日还没倒闭……这或许是一个永远都解不开的谜团。

作为一款渗透着100%百合香气的浓郁百合风AVG，我早在多年前就硬啃着不通的日文，简单地通关过一遍。不过当时介于语言障碍，真的是各种云里雾里，虽然知道故事很精彩，登场人物非常多，但是真的没太玩明白。得益于多年之后的今日，这款游戏待着英文字幕登陆Steam，而且在很多大平台还能找到详尽的汉化补丁，我终于能把这颗沧海遗珠重新拾回，好好品味把玩一番，不得不赞叹：这款游戏真的太棒了。若我这这辈子只能玩一款百合游戏，那必须是《屋上的百合灵》！作为一个资深百合厨（LSP），这部作品无论是从剧情、CV、BGM、玩法、人设、画面等各个方面，都深深戳中了我的喜好。

实话实说，这款游戏无论从任何一个方面说，都是百合控们的终极福音，百合党们神作中的神作。游戏的画面虽然不是那种细腻到每一个细节的风格，但是线条和上色给人一种刚刚好的感觉，无论从哪个角度看，就是特别舒服。基于这点，每个人物给人感觉都看着很顺眼，出场的姑娘非常多，个个都很干净水灵。稍微有些遗憾的是，也许出于经费紧张，《屋上的百合灵》没能做到全程CV，但是所有的对白我都没法跳过，声音踩点很赞，彼此的交流入戏很深，让人不禁陷入到一种温柔的理想乡里，无法自拔。

相比于同样是百合巅峰作的另一款游戏《花吻》，我无意于在这踩一捧一，只是就特色简单做一下比较。《花吻》会更得老绅士们的心，见面没事就脱个衣服，推个倒，卖一波肉，发一轮福利。但是《屋上的百合灵》则更加关注各个人物之间的CP关系以及每段故事中人物们的心态细节变化。本作的心理捕捉处理得非常真实，虽然全作根本没有我们想要的那种画面，但是那并不阻碍我玩这款游戏时，在椅子上开心地扭成一条蛆。作为一款诠释女角色的游戏，其实本作的思维导向并不会很奇特，反而价值观和思维观非常辩证，值得人们深思。

比如说对于恋爱心理学的探讨，我们主流的认知都认为男女之事才是正常的恋爱。但是本作通过一对又一对CP之间各种小故事的细腻写照，不禁让人思考：百合也好，搅基也罢，只要是真心相爱的，又有什么关系呢？游戏中主角们遭遇的很多问题，亦或是身边很多人的鄙夷，恰好也是现实生活中我们遇到或者可能遇到的。通过深挖作品中人物的关系和心理走向，我们真的可以将故事中的她们，投射到现实中的我们。甚至可以说，作品中的很多故事，就想镜子一般曾经发生，或是正在发生于我自己的生活中。少女情怀总是春，当读着一句又一句少女们的心理独白，仿佛那种心声，已经不觉渗透给我们，这份沉浸感让人陶醉。

而这款游戏最值得称道，也是最有特色的地方，在于游戏中玩家的视角处理非常特别。看惯了恋爱中不是扮演甲就是扮演乙的我们，难得这一次扮演了一个第三者，一枚电灯泡。玩家在游戏中扮演的远见结奈，受到两位英灵的驱使，帮助一对对CP开始她们的爱情补完计划。伴随着每一个故事的完结，看遍了每一段爱情的结果，玩家似乎也在修造自己的一份了不起的功德。幽灵们无法彼此触摸，更不要说做羞羞的事情，但是对于对方都有着别样的执念。游戏中用这样特殊的形式，给玩家展示了脱离肉体之外那份真情的美好，虽然没有任何卖肉社保，但是剧情的高度和深度，却早已入臻化境。如果你喜欢纯爱，特别是喜欢百合，那么这款《屋上的百合灵》是你不可以错过的顶级神作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198297743111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 3028, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2830, 'last_played': 1673835752}
review:
Kindred Spirits on the Roof… 

Uma visual novel yuri aparentemente comum, onde você vai conseguir sua dose diária de meninas gays sendo felizes juntas e é isso. Eu pensava isso quando encontrei o jogo. Foi nuns tempos difíceis pra mim, onde eu mesma estava questionando frequentemente minha própria sexualidade e precisando muito me encontrar mais comigo mesma. Buscava em livros, séries, filmes e jogos por conteúdo LGBTQ+, especificamente lésbico, porque queria muito ter mais contato com essa realidade. Acabei então me deparando com esse jogo, Kindred Spirits on the Roof. 

Fiquei meio com o pé atrás quando encontrei. Muito conteúdo de anime/mangá sexualiza [b]muito[/b] o relacionamento entre garotas, se tornando uma coisa extremamente incômoda, inclusive quando se sabe que foi feito para homens verem e não outras garotas. Então tive medo de KSotR cair no mesmo problema e me render uma experiência no mínimo decepcionante. Mas como eu estava realmente procurando e querendo, dei uma chance no fim sem ter muitas esperanças.

Não vou dar detalhes aqui de como o jogo se passa, mas sim uma visão geral de como é. A história tem como protagonista a Toomi Yuna, que é uma estudante do segundo ano que, de repente num verão, vê duas fantasmas na laje da escola. Depois de uns altos e baixos, ela conversa com as duas e descobre que se tratam de um casal de garotas que morreram e não conseguiram seguir em frente, pois estão presas no mundo dos vivos pelos seus arrependimentos. Yuna descobre, então, que isso se dá por conta dos desejos que ambas possuem, que acabam as acorrentando ali, impedindo-as de descansar. 
É dessa forma que a Yuna acaba tomando o papel de uma espécie de "cupido das lésbicas" (nome dado carinhosamente por mim) e precisa ajudar garotas apaixonadas a se resolverem com as meninas que amam. 

Enfim, enquanto escrevo isso ainda não terminei o jogo (apesar de estar bem perto de acabar). Não consegui me segurar, então pode ser que eu tenha mais pra falar depois. Mas o que eu quero dizer com essa recomendação é que esse jogo tem a história lésbica mais sincera e realística que eu já li. Eu nunca tinha tido o prazer de poder ler algo que esquentasse tanto o meu coração e fizesse tanto sentido com os meus próprios sentimentos e questões. 

O jogo não só te joga lá pra ver questões banais e superficiais levando as personagens a interagirem e ficarem juntas. Mesmo nas partes mais bobinhas, o jogo explora profundamente a visão que as personagens têm sobre elas mesmas e a relação disso com a sexualidade delas [spoiler](tudo gay)[/spoiler]. O jogo na verdade traz questões sobre homossexualidade, sobre como é ser homossexual numa sociedade homofóbica, sobre como é querer viver a sua vida com alguém e ter tanto medo de como as outras pessoas vão reagir, de alguém acabar machucando a pessoa que você ama. Então, meu, esse jogo me levou a pensar muito sobre isso e a ver visões diferentes sobre as mesmas coisas. Foi uma experiência… meu, maravilhosa. O tempo todo eu tava perdida pensando em como o roteiro desse jogo é bem escrito. Tipo, mano, se não tiver sido uma mulher lésbica escrevendo eu não acredito em mais nada na minha vida, porque puta que pariu, pega muito sabe!

Então, enfim, eu recomendo enormemente qualquer garota lésbica (e as que não são lésbicas também, é claro) a jogar esse jogo. Mas assim, jogar e aproveitar todas as horas que ele fornece de roteiro bom, porque são muitas. Recomendo porque é bem feito, as meninas não são sexualizadas, os relacionamentos delas são bem aprofundados e desenvolvidos, [i]elas[/i] são aprofundadas e desenvolvidas (nada de personagens superficiais aqui) e, bom, traz felicidade no coração. Ah, mais importante ainda! É uma história lésbica com final feliz (finalmente, pois é!).

[b]PS[/b]: Para quem é sensível com conteúdo sexual esteja avisado que o jogo tem. Eu não diria que é [i]explícito[/i] (porque nas tecnicidades não é mesmo), mas ao mesmo tempo é: você vai ver e ouvir as coisas, mas as ilustrações dos momentos não mostram as genitálias das personagens, e as descrições são muito tranquilas também. Ainda assim tem sexo acontecendo. 
Resolvi avisar porque quando peguei o jogo não sabia que ia ter e sei que pra muita gente isso incomoda bastante. 
Mas esteja avisado também que em comparação ao tempo total de jogo o que se passa de sexo é bem, [i]bem[/i] pouco.

author: {'steamid': '76561198250533598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 5304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3421, 'last_played': 1642282898}
review:
OHOHOHOHOH.
Eu sou 1 grande fã desse jogo. Em partes porque tenho um carinho enorme por ela, por ter sido umas das primeiras VN yuri que eu consumi na vida (muitos anos atrás) e que nossa, só faltei chorar quando ganhei o full chorus~. Ou seja, isso talvez afete muito meu julgamento!

O JOGO é isso mesmo que tá na sinopse, você, com a ajuda dessas fantasmas lésbicas ajuda outros casais wlw se formarem! E veja bem, isso pra mim já é genial (ou estranho) o suficiente para dar 1 chance!! 


[B]ATENÇÃO: esse jogo, as escolhas não afetam em nada. Tu libera uns extras fazendo escolhas diferentes, vê um diálogozinho diferente MAS não muda nada no geral. Não afeta o grande esquema das coisas. [/b]
Por ser caro, eu recomendo pegar 1 promoção! (eu peguei a promo que vinha com tudo e não me arrependo, pois os drama CD são bem legaizinhos)


Não consigo formular algo pra dizer além de Caras, esse jogo é genial, o ritmo dele é incrível. A evolução da Yuna que a gente vai acompanhando é incrível. Simplesmente, a bichinha eh TUDO. A história dela é interessante, realmente te deixa pensando "meu deus, o que diabos rolou com você, amg?" ou um "DESEMBUCHA MINHA FILHA" de qualquer forma, amo ela!
Meu personagem preferido é a Youka. A maior de todas, e a rota dela, toda a história dela e da Aki para mim são TUDO.

E bem, a rota que eu mENOS me importo é a da Tsukuyo pois ODEIO professor x aluno, se isso não existisse eu seria a mulher mais feliz do mundo.

As cenas de [i]aiaiuiui coisinhas gostosas[/i] acontecem né, eh claro MAS não são tantas. tem pra todo couple. Isso não conta como spoiler? Não né? Anyways.

É um jogo que tem uma história Bizarra com um desenvolvimento interessante, mas se você, assim como eu, não tinha tido tanto contato com esse tipo de conteúdo antes, pode causar um certo O QUE....! que ou vai te prender ainda mais ou vai te fazer querer distância total desse jogo! 
8 ou 80, afinal, NO FINAL DO DIA, É UM JOGO SOBRE FANTASMAS VOYEURS* E UMA MENINA ANIME TENDO QUE SER CUPIDO E APRENDENDO A LIDAR COM SUA PRÓPRIA EXISTÊNCIA!

Aiai, as personagens muito fofas, amo a Hina, parece 1 filhotinho de cachorro véi, she baby. 

(não realmente voyeurs, visto que a ideia que o jogo quer passar eh que elas tão observando unicamente para APRENDEREM algo e não por sentirem prazer ou coisa assim, mas isso parece meio ridiculo falando assim.)

Como sempre, disse tudo e não disse nada! Recomendo que jogar se curtem yuri e comédia e não se incomodem com algumas piadas datadas! 
Tem meninas anime fofas e fantasmas gays, ou seja: TUDO.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059462999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1623090495}
review:
Errrrrrrrr well.......... I guess I'd [i]sorta[/i] recommend it. Not really at the price. Get it on sale.
I'm mixed, I actually purchased this thinking illustrator Itou Hachi was involved in it, but she apparently just did the manga adaptation. Anyways,

I see a lot of reviews talking about how "realistic" the relationships progress in this game, but I really dont find this to be true. I think it might be realistic to..... overly moe slice of life tropes? But these play out and progress in such bombastic ways. The different relationships here are cute and fun in their own right, but really don't scratch the "realism" itch as well as something like Aoi Hana or Yuzumori San. Which, no, media does't have to be realistic to be enjoyable. Not everything has to be rooted in reality or straight faced. Schlocky-ness and overacting has its appeal and I don't tend to emphasize it, but I wouldn't be fooled by the prospect that there's some all girls school in japan where girls act like this and progress relationships in this way. It's over the top, it's kinda dumb, it's clearly unrealistic, but it's fun.

The general set up is pretty great as far as VNs go. Playing cupid for two ghosts who otherwise can't interact with those they look out for is a great start. The main character is blank slate enough to where it's not jarringly different from any projected player personality, but not so boring that she's emotionless and a chore to read the dialogue of. The characters have cute moments but are pretty one dimensional sometimes. There's a few characters that are guilty of being able to be described in a single sentence: their one or two quirks and their appearance.  A lot of anime media is guilty of this, but I think the appeal of Visual Novels is they kind of seek to remedy that.. Which this one finds difficult to do. The girl's interactions range from extremely mundane to........ well, less mundane more enjoyable none the less. The saving grace for what would otherwise be kinda stale interactions is the different perspectives you get to see in a non linear fashion. It's nice to see what people were thinking during certain past scenes, and to see their interpretations of events.

Voice acting is a mixed bag as well. You have a bunch of these over the top squeaky moe characters who just can't stop over acting placed alongside otherwise restrained and pleasant voice acting. Three of the characters have this sorta annoying "s" sound that keeps popping out and I can't tell if it's a lisp or just... bad mixing. Speaking of mixing...
THE MUSIC oughhhh.... I've had enough of these three basic school life tracks hahaha. They're not particularly good, not nearly ambient enough. They keep trying to throw in this pop rocky riff and chanting over everyday life dialogue and it's not only loud but just painfully unfitting. It's a 2 minute song loop that demands attention away from dialogue that already isn't that thrilling. It got on my nerves extremely fast...Maybe it wouldn't be so jarring if there were more tracks for these scenarios, but there arent. 

It's cute, it's got a charming setup, but its execution feels really rough around the edges. For 35 dollars (45 with DLC) I feel sorta let down, but I'm not disliking it or anything. It has overwhelmingly positive reviews but I'd be cautious.

Edited for grammar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015996170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 6252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5423, 'last_played': 1611452868}
review:
Well, I started reading visual novels with Highway Blossoms and thought I was spoiled.
After reading some reviews of Kindred Spirits on the roof I was skeptical but bought it anyway - luckily.
This is a nice yuri VN with likable characters, nice arts, background music and voices (DLC for all characters) and especially lovely strories.

I don't want to spoil so I keep it superficial.
You start from the perspective of the protagonist Yuna. While going through the main story you learn more about her and other characters.
Mainly after finishing the main story you get to look under the surface of all characters.
You can read other character's stories in which the characters themselves and their feelings are explained.

This novel in fact contains a student-teacher-romance and yeah, for a good reason it's forbidden in real life, but this is just a novel.
Plus the age gap is not that large and both are mature enough to know what they do.
It's just another lovely side story in this visual novel. And besides you cannot choose who you fall in love with, anyway.

I enjoyed every second of reading it - and there's a lot to read :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198064599274', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1644, 'last_played': 1674898968}
review:
全語音的DLC是一定要買的啊！太有誠意了！雖然我是第一次玩這個遊戲，聽說是百合遊戲中口碑非常高的就入了。
結果全程姨母笑wwwwwww 
主人公一開始可能會覺得沒什麼特別的，但隨著劇情的推進會越來越喜歡她，雖然是個18+百合遊戲但我認為角色們的成長和內心描寫更吸引人，遊戲的方式先是主人公的主線到一個階段後，再由其他角色的角度帶入，所以可以補到主人公角度之外的故事，讓整體更加完整。
H的部分也有語音，算是點綴而已，還非常純，純到我一直姨母笑wwwwww 比玩正統R18作還要感到臉紅wwwwww 不過有些構圖比例微妙，但是很甜，我可以無視。
總共花了我27小時全蘋果達成！不過中間有些語音我沒有聽完就跳掉，如果都不跳的話應該可以玩到30小時吧。

review:
Visual Novel fort sympathique, je l'ai trouvé drôle et attachant à la fois.

Il y a beaucoup de personnages ce qui pourrait sembler un peu étouffant mais globalement j'ai apprécié de lire leurs histoires (même si je concède comme d'autres évaluation que certaines romances semblent un peu plus rapides (trop ?) que d'autres particulièrement la dernière).

Le jeu contient de la nudité évidemment mais que je ne trouve pas utile uniquement au fan service mais plus présent comme un élément sain d'une relation de couple.

Bref, si vous hésitez à vous lancer et/ou que le genre yuri vous intrigue ce VN d'une vingtaine d'heures est à découvrir sans modération ! (à condition de comprendre l'anglais bien entendu)

author: {'steamid': '76561198103043864', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 643, 'last_played': 1603690604}
review:
TL;DR Looks good on the surface but starts to fall apart when examined closely.

[i]Kindred Spirits on the Roof[/i] started out pretty promisingly. The characters were cute without being overly saccharine, the setting seemed nice, and I couldn't wait to get back to the game whenever I closed it. I was fully prepared for this to become one of my favourite visual novels, despite not being a yuri fan per se. Unfortunately, this impression started dwindling not even a few hours in.

I think this game has a few issues, the main one being that they tried to fit too many couples in. Despite the main game's length (20+ hours with an average reading speed), you don't really get to know most of them and as a consequence, don't care for them. The game tries to tell you about them instead, with other characters saying "ah, this girl is so and so", but a lot of the time you don't really see it. For example, one of the girls is dubbed a "demon guard", but at no point was she shown being remotely mean to anyone.  Some of the characters that are introduced later seem very surface-level and tropey, and I just couldn't bring myself to feel invested in their story at all. Additionally, one of the couples is made up of a teacher and an underage student, and the game doesn't point out anything being wrong with it, it's treated as if it's a normal relationship. So... child molestation is okay, as long as it's lesbians?

Another problem directly contributing to the first one is too much filler. The game often goes into needless detail or stretches something that could have been done in a few (in-game) hours over several days. It would be lesser of an issue if it didn't take away from all the time that could have been spent on letting the reader get to know the characters more. By the time the main story ends, you barely know anything about most of the cast, and even though there is a good amount of extra scenes that supposedly could fix that, does it really matter at this point? Why would you read more about the characters the game didn't manage to make you care about in 20+ hours?

The game tries to be realistic - well, minus the ghosts - and take itself seriously, not brushing off lesbian relationships as "just a phase" and considering the real-world implications of being gay in Japan. So it's especially jarring to see many of the plot developments, such as many of the characters essentially falling in love at the first sight for no reason at all, or having so many lesbians in one school, despite the known fact that less than 5% of the world population is gay. As you can tell from the Steam store description, the main character herself is in the closet, but the pairing she gets is strange, to say the least. They have no chemistry whatsoever, and their relationship seems anything but romantic in nature even after they get together. They just don't fit together at all, it feels like their "romance" was haphazardly thrown together last minute and was pretty badly written as a result.

Overall, this game has the makings of a great yuri visual novel. The writing is pretty good, the sprites are pretty, and the music is pleasant albeit repetitive. It's just a pity that it was all so poorly managed that it fell apart not even halfway in. I went from absolutely loving it in the beginning to finishing it out of obligation. Only recommended to hardcore yuri fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026720063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1602778345}
review:
옛날 옛적에 해봤었는데 한패 나왔다는 소식 듣고 풀코러스로 질렀습니다. 그저 갓갓
이거 한 번 해보면 풍요로워져요 몇 달 정도는 퍼먹을 거 찾을 필요가 없어요 여기에 다 있으니깐...
소꿉친구 유령 선후배 3인조 사제지간 선도부원과 지각생 장기연애 이렇게 다양할 수가 있나?? 네 이게 다 있습니다
온갖 백합겜 있는 거 없는 거 다 쳐먹고 다녔지만 이거만큼 제 심금을 울린 게임이 흔치 않았어요(매운맛 싫어함 순한맛 외길인생임)
그옛날 기준으로 탐정뎐(주희희수 최고임) 수메(여주제희 최고임) 요근래 기준으로 방도리(사쯕 톰힘 최고임)마냥 잠깐 정신 놓으면 다시 돌아가서 부스러기까지 핥으면서 눈물흘리며 행복해하는 겜임... 아무튼 그럼...

다만 씬을 보려고 게임 사는 건 비추합니다. 솔직히 개인적인 생각으로는 씬 들어내고 전연령으로 내도 될 것 같아요 전연령으로 냈으면 진작에 백합충들 모여모여 자체적으로 유리토피아 건국하고 남았을 것
이라고 생각했지만 진짜 씬 부분만 싹 들어낸다고 19금이 아니게 되는 게 아니네요? 전개상 뺄 수가 없잖아? 다시 생각해보니까 안 되겠네요...

여튼 순한맛 좋아하시는 분들께 강력히 추천드립니다 꼭 사시고 미키 세이나 / 아키 요우카 보세요

author: {'steamid': '76561198141605136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 549, 'last_played': 1600548783}
review:
I'm a huge Yuri fan and played quite a few VN in that category. I'm sorry to say it's the worst I ever played, and I really tried hard. Here is why :
- THE DAMN MUSIC. Oh god, the main 'cheerful' music is terrible, a 10 seconds loop that goes over and over, really cheap and annoying. This music pop out all the time and just simply doesn't fit the mood quite often. I ended up playing without music at all.
- Too much useless filler dialog. A bit of everyday chat is fine to give a realistic touch to the story and get to empathize more with the characters, but the balance is broken here. I'm patient and a good reader, but I just don't see the point of reading 5 minutes about cooking. I fast forwarded many scenes without reading, which never happened to me. I would say 2/3rd of the game are just filler to make it longer, but doesn't bring anything to the story.
- Characters are unrealistic, thus you won't easily empathize with any of the pairings, let aside identify yourself with any of the girls. One girl sleep through all day and speak like a sloth, another one is a teacher that looks like a 10 year old, etc. come on...
- Harem effect, where every damn girl is gay which is unrealistic too
- The gameplay makes the overall story impersonal and hard to connect emotionally with. Playing cupid with various couples just isn't my thing. There is at least one couple (for me all but one) that you won't have interest in / won't like and you will have to read hours about them.

I wish I could go back in time and don't spend 40$ on this. I played so many yuri VNs that were 10 times better and 4 times cheaper...

author: {'steamid': '76561198880541808', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1121, 'last_played': 1655784139}
review: This game is absolutely wonderful, and might be one of my favorite games of all time, because its certainly the most emotional experience I've ever had with a game. It may sound a little silly based on the summary, but it is really a deeply sweet, emotionally vulnerable, exuberantly joyful, bittersweet game about various lesbian couples at a girls' high school finding their love for each other and exploring their relationships, all thanks to the meddling of some gay ghosts who live on the roof. You get to have a lot of time with each of the couples, all of which are profoundly memorable (seriously, even the couple that I thought was gonna be lame ended up being literally the best among a lineup of absolute 10/10 yuri romances), as well as follow a main story that features the drama of trying to get certain couples together, plus some fantastic development of the main character's feelings, all capped off with a bittersweet, highly emotional finale that wrecked me for weeks. If you like yuri even a little, you have to play this game. Its a blockbuster, a five-star full-course meal of shojo yuri romance, set in a world of dreamy-eyed youth so sweet it made me literally want to die and become a high school anime lesbian in a world so much purer than ours. That will never happen, but at least we have this game. And that is a beautiful thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198267849409', 'num_games_owned': 355, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 6677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1618416231}
review:
好久没有这么喜欢一个游戏了，真的是超爱，最近满脑子都是这个，没玩过的快来玩，一定不会后悔的。
音乐、剧情、立绘、配音等等都非常优秀，吹爆啊，感觉玩起来根本停不下来。
可惜接触到的太晚了，碟以及其他周边什么的都很难收到了，有些遗憾。
游戏本身多多少少有些问题，但是瑕不掩瑜，这依然是一部很优秀的游戏，至少我这么觉得。
以日历的形式在推进主线的过程中多条线推进其他cp剧情，这模式我也很喜欢，蛮有意思的，
就是日历不太好点啊，有时候稍微偏一点就点不开，稍微有点麻烦。
游戏里cp有好几对但是每一对的故事都讲的很清楚，通过女主、两位百合灵以及当事人的不同角度将故事相当完整地呈现了出来。
每个人物都有着自己独特的性格，并没有让人觉得哪个人物的存在是多余的，每一对都有着独立的故事，却又互相联系在一起。
没有阿野线不少人都觉得遗憾，我也觉得有些可惜，不过感觉倒还好，因为在前面剧情的时候看到阿野说了那番话就觉得她俩看来是没戏了，不过看了半天其他cp的时候有想过女主cp会是谁呢，然后想到大概是不太可能出现个新人物，估摸着就是比奈或者阿野了。但是当时真的觉得按照一般游戏的发展邻家妹妹的可能性不大，没想到马上就被打脸，幼驯染赢了。不过小忠犬不是挺好吗，我还真没有觉得结奈跟比奈在一起有什么不好，结奈这样的温柔的妹子由比奈来守护不是也挺好吗，不过游戏里结奈的感情线跟其他几对比起来薄弱了很多啊，有些不够看，不管怎么说官方同人里还是有讲比奈的内心部分，也算是对游戏内容的一个补充了吧，也不算太遗憾。
阿野之前每次都在结奈需要帮助的时候助攻，我就觉得她是不是知道了什么，但是压什么也没说我就觉得可能是我想多了，没想到她居然真的是有意识的在帮忙。
音七跟阿野两个人都是看似随意实际内心非常细腻的人，真的都好温柔啊，没有cp有点可惜，有点能理解她俩cp文出现的原因了hhh。
说起来结奈是我的理想型，这么好的妹子要是能碰到怎么会不想娶回家呢？！羡慕了...比奈快过来跟我决斗（
结奈原来的经历真是让人心疼死了，这么温柔善良的人受到这种待遇真是不公平。看到她最后终于放下当初发生的事带来的影响，虽然欣慰于她终于克服了心理阴影再次前进，可还是觉得生气，凭什么那帮人这么说了还要结奈替她们着想，真有什么意见当面说啊，背地里说这种话还能是没有恶意？真不愿意只说出来我还能佩服一下，只敢背地里嚼舌根算什么东西。真这么不愿意直接拒绝自己来也行啊，还能逼着你不成，结奈不花时间不费精力的吗，一边享受帮助一边说人家坏话还要不要脸了。要是有人愿意这么帮我我感谢还来不及呢，没必要替素质这么差的人找借口。
小牧为美纪前辈差点把摄影部的人打了的时候我真的是想给她拍手叫好，如果当初结奈身边也有这么个人保护她就好了，她就一定不会是玩家刚见到的时候那个样子，虽然看起来很帅气，却是内心受到伤害所做出的自我保护。留校时候的结奈真帅气啊，果然优秀的人怎么都无法掩盖自身的光芒。
希望她们以后能过得更好，一直幸福下去。

review: 따뜻한. 포근하게 감싸고 다정하게 다독거려주는 행복한 이야기. 조금 느긋하고 잔잔할 수는 있지만 백합이라는 장르가 취향에 맞는다면 좋은 선택이 될 것이다. 귀여운 학생들을 보다보면 나도 모르게 입가가 올라가며 가슴께가 간질거리게 된다. 행복하고 다정한. 기분좋은 이야기로 가득찬 게임.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056660754', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 700, 'last_played': 1596612423}
review:
Definitely one of the best VN about relationship (+ yuri!) that I have read. The variety of relationships, the way the characters talk with each other... It all culminates to a really great experience.

Still need to finish the game, but so far it's really one of my favorite romance works.

Edited: Just finished it, and... wow. That's REALLY good. Definitely really lovable set of cast, and I love how everything goes... except there's one where I just feel like it should be done rather quickly but I understand too. In the end it's all just so satisfying and I love it!

If you love romance and yuri, definitely give this gem a try!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981638563', 'num_games_owned': 4007, 'num_reviews': 518, 'playtime_forever': 773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 773, 'last_played': 1596195853}
review:
[h1]EXPLAIN! EXPLAIN!
~[i]Dalek[/i][/h1]

I'm writing eroge reviews now! Eroge are cool! … Only they're not. At least, in my opinion. And that's the funniest thing here. See, I had all reasons to dislike this game. Not only it can (and should) be considered as eroge, it's also one of those visual novels, in which there are no flags. Well, technically, there [i]are[/i] flags here, but those don't really matter (I'll return to it a bit later). In other words, on paper, this game is everything I dislike. And yet... here's a thumb up from me. Now here's the question - [i]what the heck?[/i] Well, let me explain.

First of all, I kinda dig the title. I mean, the original one, not the one they've made up for an English version. See, this game is all about gay girls. And the original title was [b]Okujō no Yurirei-san[/b] ([b]屋上の百合霊さん[/b]). Which means “[i]Lesbian ghosts from the roof[/i]”. Or “[i]Lesbighosts from the roof[/i]”. And I don't know, there's something really funny in the original title. Something catchy. And the story? It's exactly that. Lesbian ghosts. On the roof.

The game follows the [b]Toomi Yuna[/b], a schoolgirl who just met two ghosts who love each other but... can't pass on. The ghosts ask [b]Yuna[/b] to help them by helping some other young girls who love each other but have serious troubles admitting their feelings and desires. You can see where all this is going and, of course, you're correct. Only don't expect much gameplay. Because [b]Yuna[/b] here is more like a bystander. All she (and therefore – you) can do here is to watch. In other words – you click the left mouse button enough times – you win the game and see the best possible ending for everybody. No way to loose, no real reason for the second run. The choices are there, but first – there are only fifteen of them and second – the only reason for them to exist is to unlock some extra scenes that will become available after you'll finish the main story. In other words, choices are here, but at the same exact time... they're not.

Sounds pretty bad and, well, it is. Personally? I'll never consider this kind of visual novels to be a real deal. [i]But[/i]. This game comes with a set of really awesome characters. It's really, [i]really[/i] hard not to love the girls and seeing them opening to each other? It's a really heartwarming experience. This game is so cute that [b]Ryūgū Rena[/b] would totally want to take it home and characters are very believable. While artwork? It's absolutely brilliant. Not only it fits the atmosphere perfectly, it really makes the game to stand out. It helps the game to keep things cute but not too sugary. Perfect for a yuri game. [b]UI[/b] is also very comfortable and you can set up the game to fit your personal play style.

The most arguable thing here is the eroge element. Like I said at the beginning of this review, I'm not really a fan of eroge genre. And most of the time? This game doesn't feel like eroge. Like... [i]all[/i]. It's a surprisingly pure story about five (technically – six, but I don't want to spoil it to you) couples and their feelings. It's just that – [i]feelings[/i]. Nothing else. At the end of every story, though (the stories take place at the same exact time, but thanks to a very useful [b]UI[/b] you won't get confused), there'll be a sex scene for every couple. And personally? I can't say I liked that. Those kind of ruined the mood for me and after hours of a pure and innocent content having this kind of stuff is... arguable. Can't say those scenes are bad, though. Quite the opposite. Surprisingly, developers were able to keep even sex scenes pure. Believe it or not.

So, even though technically, [b]Okujō no Yurirei-san[/b] is just another eroge with no real choices, there's something very special about it. The game has a soul and even though it's eroge, there's a certain purity in it. As the result, it's totally worth checking even for people like me who usually don't like that kind of stuff. And if you'll like the characters, there's also quite a lot of drama [b]CD[/b]s for you to pick up. Fully translated to [b]English[/b] (subtitles). What's not to like?

author: {'steamid': '76561198402565740', 'num_games_owned': 351, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 1292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1224, 'last_played': 1596159166}
review:
非常轻松治愈又甜蜜的游戏呢~
7对CP，每一对都有专属配音，剧情也都很甜呢~
对玩家来说以日历的形式来选择故事进行游玩真的很方便~
每天看几段甜甜的小剧情真的很惬意~
今天终于肝完啦。没想到除了主线剧情之外还有附赠内容~有点番外的意思~里面的每个角色都有很好的结局呢~看完之后感觉又暖又甜喔。
最重要的是！！！
CG真的太好看啦！！！
而且有H的剧情，也没有打码喔~~~
配音也真的超级撩，小姐姐叫的我真的脸红心跳啊啊啊啊 啊啊啊
最喜欢比奈还有小月代啦~~~~可爱死了呜呜呜
希望可以以阿野为主角再出一部游戏啊~~~~一定买爆！！！

review: 很棒的群像剧，百合够甜并且有伊藤八千的续作漫画，但是要自己打汉化，我个人喜欢学姐线还有我想走女主和阿野线虽然没有。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066040315', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1595569231}
review:
A fluffy and heartwarming adventure about yuri-fying all the school.
It's literally impossible to go wrong with this theme.

Jokes aside, the voice acting is really good, the CG's are well drawn and the story is really good. It just takes a while to get going. Definitely not the kind of VN for someone who wants a fast-paced story that get quickly to the point. Think about it as some kind of shoujo manga, with a lot of build-up, but a really satisfying conclusion.

YURITOPIA

author: {'steamid': '76561198025734019', 'num_games_owned': 856, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 4697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4697, 'last_played': 1595159712}
review:
[h1]Yuritopia 达成！[/h1]

本作当年在steam上发售的时候就买来玩过了，本次特惠期间又入手了full chorus版dlc，于是重新体验了一遍。

玩下来感觉真是棒啊，经典之作是这样，无论什么时候拿出来都能玩得很开心。这次全程看下来意外的喜欢阳香和爱来这对，尤其是阳香，简直蠢得恰到好处。当然最棒的还是女主本人了，只可惜「那个线路」还是没有。

full chorus版应该是用了以前广播剧的cv阵容，很赞，另外感觉额外附加了很多小故事的样子？（也可能是我当年玩过主线就草草了事，记不太清了…

总之想要糖分的话，玩这部准没错。

author: {'steamid': '76561198089668738', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 6107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6023, 'last_played': 1677616619}
review: As a fan and connoisseur of yuri in all of its forms, from movies to light novels, Kindred Spirits on the Roof holds a very special place in my heart for how steady, healthy, and believable the progression of its relationships is. Not only is this excessively rare in the yuri genre (and romance as a whole), but Kindred Spirits manages to do this not just with one couple, but with 5, and despite the two other couples not being explored in this same light, both still managed to bring me to tears. Of course, in the tear department, its genre gives it an inherent advantage: I tend to cry a LOT during yuri stories and rarely, if ever anywhere else, so maybe you could take that with a grain of salt, but don't let that distract you from the fact that Kindred Spirits was still completely stunning to me, and when I played this game, I had been a fan of the genre for years, and I think that's pretty damn impressive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198351807250', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1630692678}
review: it's pretty fun, and the first few hours were very enjoyable, but honestly i cant get over how weird some aspects of it are. the romance between a teacher and a student, and the main couple coercing some minors to help them have sex,,, i dont know man. take those out and its a very wholesome and wonderful story, but its hard to really ignore that looming fact in the back of my head.  :(

author: {'steamid': '76561198176026233', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2397, 'last_played': 1682285158}
review:
An incredible story about love and lesbians. You might have heard of the xxx scenes, well, they're not really all that detailed. But if you're here for the xxx, you're missing out on the whole point, go buy a Sakura game or something.

This is a game about love, you get to see multiple couples form throughout the story and watch their individual struggles as they deal with both being women (they are all 18+, I swear), and the issues that come from being people. Because that's what this story is about, it's about people falling in love, not plastic toys fawning about some clueless Chad. 

Overall, if you're into romance and are tired of seeing terribly written stories and games made to sell tits, this is without a doubt what I'd recommend. Filled with cute girls and characters you can really root for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085367707', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 373, 'playtime_forever': 799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 799, 'last_played': 1587446959}
review:
Kindred Spirits on the Roof é uma Visual Novel extremamente tocante, engraçada e calorosa. Foi uma das primeiras com conteúdo adulto a ser admitida no Steam sem nenhum tipo de corte na época em que jogos do tipo eram restritos por aqui.

Mas apesar da classificação e de existirem sim algumas cenas com conteúdo sexual, elas não são explicitas e tem foco não no ato propriamente dito, mas sim no relacionamento entre os personagens e no sentimento que eles nutrem entre si.

A trama é realmente muito boa e se passa na Academia de Comércio para meninas de Kokonotsuboshi, onde estuda Toomi Yuna, uma garota solitária que costumava fazer suas refeições sozinha durante o intervalo da escola. 

Yuna não era do tipo que gosta de companhia e preferia não se envolver com ninguém. Assim, ela geralmente ia ao terraço, pois lá poderia comer tranquila e apreciar a paisagem sem ser perturbada.

Porém, em um dia normal como qualquer outro, ela foi surpreendida por duas garotas fantasmas, que lhe pediram um favor um tanto quanto inusitado, virando seu mundo de cabeça para baixo.

Yuna inicialmente reluta, mas acaba aceitando, pois acreditava que não teria como se livrar dos fantasmas se não as ajudasse. O problema é que a tarefa consistia em ajudar casais de garotas a criarem coragem de relevar os seus sentimentos umas para as outras.

Conforme a história progride, Yuna aprende mais sobre si mesma, conquista novos amigos e enfrenta muitas dificuldades, mas percebe que ao ajudar os fantasmas do telhado ela também acabou por espantar os seus “fantasmas” do passado.

O jogo progride dia após dia ao longo de alguns meses na escola. Há inclusive um calendário que funciona como um Hub de onde se pode ver cenas que já foram reveladas ou continuar com a campanha, além de transitar entre as diversas histórias paralelas.

Isso porque, depois de presenciar determinado acontecimento na linha principal com Yuna, você também poderá vê-lo da perspectiva de outros personagens envolvidos em quadros específicos de cada um.

Ocorre inclusive de você se encontrar com a própria Yuna na pele de outros personagens e daí você poderá escutar seus pensamentos em reação as respostas que você lhes deu como Yuna quando jogava na linha principal.

Obviamente, isso só é possível porque os personagens são complexos e com a personalidade muito bem construída. Seus desejos e pensamentos ficam claros ao passarmos pelo quadro específico e então tudo se encaixa na linha principal.

A este ponto, você já deve ter percebido, mas vale dizer que Kindred Spirits on the Roof não é um jogo erótico, e, aliás, a primeira cena mais quente só aparece depois de umas dez horas de quase trinta que o jogo tem.

O sexo não é sexo por si só, mas sim o ápice de um relacionamento que foi construído ao longo do semestre escolar, com alguns empurrõezinhos do jogador metido a cupido.

Quanto às escolhas feitas pelo jogador, elas apenas causam ligeiras alterações em algumas falas dos personagens, mas não tem o condão de alterar o curso da história, então não há resposta errada, nem melhor e não há como falhar a história. 

O desfecho é exatamente aquilo que se espera desde o início, mas isso não quer dizer que a trama é previsível. Muito pelo contrário, é cheia de surpresas e muitos dos casos reservam acontecimentos realmente emocionantes.

Em suma, Kindred Spirits on the Roof é uma impressionante Visual Novel, que explora de forma brilhante e delicada a temática do amor entre garotas. No final, o jogo só quer incentivar que as pessoas tenham a coragem necessária para revelar seus sentimentos, sejam eles convencionais ou não. EXCELENTE (9/10).

author: {'steamid': '76561197970741812', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1961, 'last_played': 1592256662}

It is more like Kinetic Novel. Base game doesn't have all the lines voiced but I strongly suggests buying Full Chorus DLC so you can enjoy all the lines wonderfully voice acted from the beginning.

I strongly suggests buying this if you like romance and yuri stories.

review: Bought this VN when on sale and then picked up the dlc as well, which i highly recommend getting that as well. After full clearing the game my thoughts are that it is a very cute game with very cute couples. it does only take around 25-35 hours to full clear the game so 45 dollars at full price seems a bit much but if you enjoy yuri or cute visual novels then i highly recommend this game. the game is very linear with limited choices that really don't matter that much making it closer to Kinetic Novel. I personally enjoy enjoy kinetic novels since i don't have to worry about making the wrong choices or have a walkthrough for certain routes. Game is a solid 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198373490855', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2095, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2077, 'last_played': 1631390015}
review:
Kindred Spirits' story necessitates it to have a multitude of characters. While they fit into their romance tropes, their respective side stories clarify intent. In many cases, these characters are more aware of the situation unfolding than the perspective you witness. 

Each pair is given ample time to explore their inner strife, but Yuna, the main character, is a master class of her own. It is easy forget between all the yuri-cupidery, that Yuna is her own character. That makes it more pleasant when her arc is completed, providing a satisfying conclusion.

The story requires suspension of reality. The ghosts are an acceptable aspect and fits rather cutely into the story. 
However, their motivation and how they intend to achieve it are dubious. Especially towards a vital point, character choices are a bit ridiculous but necessary for the plot to conclude. The romance plots are contrived, but are not groan-inducing.

I appreciate the consistency between the art of the sprites and the CGs. It is jarring in some VNs when CGs are clearly higher budget than the sprite art. That being said, the CGs are acceptable, if not just for functionality.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020322472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1725, 'last_played': 1599726192}
review:
This is one of the very best VNs I've ever enjoyed. It's currently my favorite and I'm not sure what it would take for another title to unseat it from the throne.

It's got it all: heartwarming stories; a premise that is ostensibly ludicrous but is more than redeemed by outstanding execution; well-developed characters who grow and adapt, drawing your tears and cheers and the occasional urge to slap one silly; tropes and open, honest sentiment that are presented as things to be enjoyed rather than subverted or viewed through the lens of ironic detachment. 

If you love women, love Yuri, and love excellent stories that will stay with you long after the last click, this VN is for you. 

PS: Youka and Aki are the best couple but that's just because I'm a rank sentimentalist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057220699', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3054, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1606, 'last_played': 1615597351}
review:
Usually i don't write that many reviews, but if a game really leaves an impression on you, then it deserves a proper review.

Kindred Spirits on the roof praises itself for being the first yuri-based visual novel on Steam that is completely uncensored. I'm sure that this is the reason most people bought this game, which is good, because while it totally caters to and fills all your yuri needs, this game provides you with a whole lot more.

The characters in the game are all hugely diversified. After you've discovered all of the girls and their respective love interest, helping them getting together, you really get attached to every single one of them.
Every character has their own traits, quirks and loveabale characteristics.
Every couple has really wholesome, loveable scenes, you get a lot of laughs from certain characters, some really valuable life lessons that you can apply to yourself irl, as well.

I don't wanna spoiler too much, but i can wholeheartedly say that if you are a fan of visual novels and you want a truely "wholesome" experience that is all about girl / girl romance, grab this game, it is totally worth it, it is not an all-out f-fest, it is "wholesome" (that is truely the best word for this game) experience with lots of loveable characters and loveable interactions between the couples.
And yes, there are some hardfelt moments and some moments that might make you shed a tear or two, so be prepared for some truely deep storylines.
I haven't completed the game entirely yet, but i think i'm about 75% done and i can definitely say: One of the best games i've ever played.

if you're interested, i'm currently let's playing the game on my channel. New episodes every friday, maybe you'd get a kick out of it in experiencing the ride together. (Shameless self-plug) ;)

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLe6SB4e9VpR6uCmfAFtM0am8GA0ct3Onn

author: {'steamid': '76561198197874137', 'num_games_owned': 2426, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 556, 'last_played': 1624533656}
review:
First of all I am not into yuri at all however I am into Visual Novels, I liked the art and the reviews seemed very enthousiastic so I got it on sale. As I read that it's only partly voiced I also bought the voicing package, the game and the voices costed 17€ which was around historical low at the time, it was well worth it.
I find the planner extremely cute, the spirits well drawn and I often let the game in background while replying to messages enjoying the music. I only met 2 of the couples currently  so I am only at the beginning of the game. For now it is really nice, I have stressfull days and playing the game gives me that warmth I need to keep faith in humanity.
The story isn't fast paced but isn't too slow either, I would recommend the game.

Edit: I forgot to mention the only negative side of the game as I far as I know of: You can't screenshot it, you have to make a manipulation explained in the forum to be able to do it. I wasn't able to make it happen but maybe you'll be one of the lucky ones!

author: {'steamid': '76561198311059100', 'num_games_owned': 1326, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1588067159}
review: 开头先说：如果你喜欢校园日常百合的，买就对了！                                                                                                               通关了（虽然显示只有7个多钟头，但应该时间更多的，不知道怎么回事，有一个晚上的时间steam没记录进去，我重新验证了游戏以后才恢复计时，不过又出现了这种情况，所以这个时长是不准的，我估摸了下应该认真看，最起码要13小时左右的时间通关），断断续续的，从一开始觉得枯燥，到后面觉得确实很安心很舒服，目前玩下来最喜欢的是老师和女主一起追那个女生的画面了，特别有意思。当然，游戏玩到后期部分，会有轻微的H情节，不过即使没有H，我也变得有很强的动力玩下去了（ps：H部分和黄油比真的算是清水了，不过恰到好处，而且给游戏反而增加了一点情趣。我想下，色而不淫，很适合这里），这也许就是成功的galgame的魅力吧，用日历形式来表现了多个事件线的时间交错点。很棒，而且多个事件线又各自用了不同人做第一视角，所以对很多情节很心理都描绘的很细腻，百合佳作！真的是很青涩美好的爱情，没有一对情侣是让人不舒服的，都很喜欢，每一位角色刻画的都很好，让人觉得每一个都不是多余的不必要的，爱了爱了。还有就是游戏内的确牵扯了一点点显示问题，但我觉得制作组处理的很棒，没在这些问题上花过多的笔墨，所以让人玩的很安心，百合百的很舒坦。还有玩之前，看到评论都在说为啥没有阿野线，欠大家一条阿野线，一头雾水的，然后现在玩了后，尼玛，制作组，敢不敢出个dlc补一下阿野线啊，阿野好讨喜啊！！还有不得不夸的是，当我以为通关了的时候，制作组给了我们一份附赠。附赠的内容会对各个人物（包括不是情侣之间人物的）的关系互动和故事补充。让大家的人际网更加的立体充实。好评！还有就是，当一切都结束的时候，心里空落落的，真的很不舍，希望故事还能延续下去！

author: {'steamid': '76561198848337042', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 8465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8465, 'last_played': 1587456390}
review:
本篇改于2020.5.6


我不知道我还能说我需要推荐什么，这个游戏时长已经证明了这个游戏的可玩性已经超出你的想象。

用尽全力去安利！人物塑造非常到位！每个出场角色都是良心的全语音！6对满载糖果的CP船，每条感情线都甜爆！各式又纯又甜的青涩恋爱，师生恋、姐妹恋、闺蜜恋、青梅恋、豪放之恋，这几个还不够么（剩下的1对是老司机）！

玩就是了！！！

And最重要的，这个游戏不需要H，即使3句不离H，但是这群主角们还是太清纯了（捂脸）

其实是根本没有很需要遮的东西

我知道你们在找什么：ht中tps://weibo.文com/tt这article是/p/show?id微=230940博4330613380376839（这真的不是那个and记住删字）

还有一句必看：同处国区的朋友们，游玩时你们一定要有全语音包才会有完美体验，叫Kindred Spirits on the Roof Full Chorus，由于锁区，建议直接翻墙购买

author: {'steamid': '76561198843781301', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1601164807}
review:
长颈鹿推荐，长篇预警
通关了，，，玩这个真的原地去世，太长了，我的长颈鹿之魂支撑着我。压力马斯内。意见有两个已经有大佬说过了我再啰嗦下。。整体剧情就是女主和幽灵帮助不同的女孩子在一起的很多剧情线，然后女主一条主线。但是说实话女主线剧情有点无趣，选项全是无关紧要的，如果可以我喜欢女主金毛cp（这次是幼驯染战胜天降呢），还有就是koba-youka校园祭那首表白歌旋律想听。
喜欢这游戏有这么几点
1.解释了常识里不合理的东西为合理，tsurugimine-kiri那句“我小时候起就喜欢可爱的女孩子了，好想抱住”。以及忘记谁说的那句“我喜欢的恰好是你，只是你恰好是女孩子”（wakarimashi）
2。感情很细腻，女主从以前一个人孤单到后面慢慢走出来以及接受表白，心理活动描述的很好（究竟什么是爱“loving someone，that feeling ，it's you and yous alone.我翻不好，你自己品）
3.cv超棒，难得的不怎么快进的gal（快进就看不懂也有原因www）画面真的少的不行，但是配音丝毫不逊色，aki（纪检委员）声音太攻了吧，有点出戏。所有cp里个人快进的比较多的是matsuri（没错马自立）和miya（田径组），当然基本剧情还是看完了，最喜欢的cp是最开始的maki和Aihara组（温柔学姐和高一学妹）哇学妹那段怒哄真的吓到我了，cv真的厉害，温柔学妹为了学姐隐忍真实情感（和侑是不是有点像，麻吉天使）。
最后是吐槽，明明是r18游戏吧，前期清水的一批，到1w页时候突然有奇怪剧情我才知道自己买的是r18啊靠（买的时候我真不知道是r18）。还有性教育都不普及的吗，基本kiss后就don't know what to do ？还有师生组kiri说出so you are a virgin?这话太生草了，（随后被tsukyo老师逆推了，可喜可贺可喜可贺）（今晚教你duang大人哦j）这游戏r18部分配音属实顶，建议全部听完。最后，有的画面实在太崩了（当然很多年前的游戏，这太难为他人了），最后幽灵组成佛离开的时候画面也不修一下，我都能给你修好(bushi),明明很悲伤的场景却哭不出来www。
话说好像有汉化补丁？？wtf？？我tm，我还拿小本本记下名字谁是谁。。可能很长时间不会玩gal了，总共24000页我也不知道怎么打完的，还有点成就感？二次元边缘人士表示希望steam上架更多搞姬gal呐。顺便一说玩的大部分时间没网，总游戏时长30h+吧（多线剧情嘛），太长了，，英语垃圾有点崩溃www。以上。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031786174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2, 'playtime_at_review': 1633, 'last_played': 1711996355}
review: Really excellent VN. While it tends to play it a little safe and it's pretty fluffy overall, it still tells a story that kept me engaged throughout. Plus, with tons of couples to follow, even if one of the plotlines isn't interesting to you there's always a bunch more right around the corner.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281261951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4851, 'last_played': 1618183161}
review:
Amato questo gioco sin da quando l'ho iniziato (credo 3 anni fa) e senza considerare che, da quando poi hanno inserito anche l'estensione con le voci di tutte, anche fuori campo, la mia voglia di rigiocare ogni volta è sempre presente. Sia per poter snocciolare meglio le storie di ogni coppia, come per il singolo personaggio di cui si parla, con quello sprint in più se riesci anche a udire la sua voce.
Se consiglio questo gioco? Assolutamente, soprattutto a coloro che amano questo determinato genere e vogliono provare sia l'emozione pura ed eterea, come quella invece passionale che ti fa palpitare il cuore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083709322', 'num_games_owned': 182, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1840, 'last_played': 1586094339}
review:
剧情很不错的百合群像剧。cp也很多，人设也讨喜，甜度适当，不如说每一对成了之后糖都很足。个人觉得结奈那条线稍微有点短，可能是对比奈的感情刻画没有其他人那么足（但很可爱所以原谅了）
[spoiler] 其中不足就是没有阿野线，音七也没和谁处cp，我超喜欢音七啊~ [/spoiler]
吹就完事了，打了补丁大概25-30h的游戏流程，这个价格也很实惠了，还有各种广播剧外传，甚至有[strike] 法外狂徒 [/strike] 伊藤老师的外传漫画，嗯，买就完事儿了！

author: {'steamid': '76561198396645805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3338, 'last_played': 1583891423}
review:
Kindred Spirits on the Roof has some excellent moments but they're not worth all the drudge in between. The story focuses on too many characters and is told from too many perspectives and gets cut up into too many mixed up pieces that are then presented non-linearly. Not only is it a mess but most of the desperately needed characterisation is locked away in extra scenes you can only unlock AFTER completing the story.

It's not just the story and it's presentation that's at fault though; if you bought the full chorus DLC you'll be treated to perhaps the worst audio mixing I've ever seen! It's not unbearable but many characters speak at different volumes and across way too wide volume ranges. Combined with a music volume that NEEDS to be lowered in the options before you can play results in a decidedly unprofessional product. A sentiment only furthered by the mediocre unlooped music which will completely cut out leaving you in silence for more than a few seconds before blaring back in all of a sudden in a way that you probably couldn't make more distracting if you tried.

Ultimately the game is not terrible. This is mostly because of just how much game there is. If you see all of it there will absolutely be parts that you enjoy or even love but I guarantee that they won't be worth the rest of the game to experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102366905', 'num_games_owned': 854, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1583373335}
review:
优点：日志系统较好的展现了多对CP的进展，流程较长，表现了每个人的特点，讲好了各对CP从相遇到做菜的全流程（这一点是大部分同类VN做不到的），也反映了ntxl的一些现实问题（出柜、直女朋友、师生等）

不喜欢的地方：
1.分辨率较低
2.大部分视角在结奈身上，结奈一直在做工具人，玩家替结奈做出的选择却无法影响她最后的结局。年下运动系本来就不喜欢，对比奈的描写又很少，且大部分集中于其运动能力的描写，而比奈对结奈的爱情怎么产生，为什么结奈要选择比奈则十分含糊。
3.没有阿野线
4.虽然涉及了一些现实问题，但轻轻带过，直接校园做菜

author: {'steamid': '76561198441163312', 'num_games_owned': 70, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1211, 'last_played': 1697748116}
review:
注意！全语音dlc一定要买！！
最开始其实也是冲着无码h来的，但是玩过之后就真的喜欢上了这个故事。女孩子们的心理描写得很细腻啊，对于第二次尝试视觉小说的我来说这绝对是一次很不错的体验（第一次是著名社保游戏nekopara）。每一个人物都很有特点，虽然觉得要是人物形象再饱满一些就好了。剧情方面虽然觉得结奈对比奈的动摇有点突然（削个土豆就这样。。），但整体来讲循序渐进还是挺稳的，日程表的形式也很喜欢，同一件事在不同视角下的展开也很有趣。至于h，清水成这样我觉得确实没必要打码，声优姐姐们的演绎已经很精彩了。最后，小月代我太可以了！！！！！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198415089438', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 929, 'last_played': 1580796852}
review:
百合真好啊！感情描绘细腻，少女在感情中出现的矛盾与踌躇，揣测与试探在游戏里面体现得很好很真实，角色对于自己感情的表现出来的勇气和珍惜过于美好！怀着姨母的心情见证了一对对情侣喜结连理，每次看到她们解开心结相互理解的样子都感动得流眼泪orz
游戏整体玩法挺好，不过里面的选择设出来好像对剧情没啥影响就是摆设的样子，结局只有一条线（站错cp的我哭了），自由度不太高，就是视觉小说的感觉吧，但是值得一买，百合游戏的经典之作。只要是百合我就给钱系列.jpg

author: {'steamid': '76561198079167935', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1009, 'last_played': 1581137164}
review:
완벽한 갓글화패치의 정석.. 
일본애니 특유의 오글오글한 대사, 단어가 굉장히 자연스럽게 의역된 느낌!
그러면서도 의도했던 느낌을 최대한 살렸다.

연출도 메뉴화면부터 엔딩까지 부족함을 찾기가 힘들었다.

스토리의 정교함, 섬세함을 플레이 내내 느낄 수 있었다. 
다른 스토리도 사랑스럽고 멋지지만,
[spoiler]특히 요우카/아키 스토리의 경우 캐릭터 설정, 말 하나 행동 하나 전부 고심한 흔적을 그대로 느낄 수 있었다.[/spoiler]

이것들이 없었다면 클라이막스 떄 캐릭터들이 그렇게 행동할 수 있었을까, 받아들였을 수 있었을까 생각이 든다.

이 게임은 감정 이입하며 플레이해도 괜찮고 잡지 읽듯이 해도 재미있고 설렌다.

무엇보다 캐릭터들이 전부전부 각자의 매력이 잘 묻어나온다. 버릴 캐릭터가 단 하나도 없는게 신기할 정도!
[strike]난 주인공이 젤 이쁘더라[/strike]

아직 어나더 스토리는 안봤지만, 메인, 서브, 어나더 스토리까지 볼 수 있다면 세일할 때는 전혀 아깝지 않다고 생각한다. 애틋함과 여러 종류의 감동은 덤으로!

[strike]아니 사랑하는건 알겠는데 다들 뭐하는짓이여? 아직 고등학생들이라고? 고1이 고3과 뭐하는 ㅈ...읍읍 [/strike]



추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046252156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 10455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6969, 'last_played': 1642708907}
review:
I very much enjoyed this story.

The MC was a cute and nice girl whom I liked. She really does grow in this and you see why she was like she was.
I also liked Sachi, one of the ghosts, She also went through a change in her self, the other annoyed me.

Many of the others involved are nice, some do grow as well, though a couple are annoying at times.

It is a nice long story with back story..

It features many issues, some around gay relationships.

There is alot to this game and will keep you indulged and make you laugh at times to.

You will enjoy it

author: {'steamid': '76561198317833615', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1602429434}
review:
百合情怀补票，剧情很平淡，确实并没有什么让人耳目一新的地方。而且多视角剧情回收的时候经常造成不必要的流水账重复上演，难免造成枯燥乏味。不过爱来和摇滚少女换一个视角就是两情相悦，观感很不错。通篇下来唯一一个比较有代入感的场景，只有一开始的帮助小牧送出情书，着实有些感动。但继续往后就没有什么太大波澜起伏了。作为AVG游戏，文字功底确实不行，总的来说作为情怀还是好评。
但是，你给我看百合，我就给你钱！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
百合灵真好！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198287935951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 5323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5219, 'last_played': 1605259437}
review:
정말 재밌었습니다.

주인공이 백합령의 미련을 풀어 주기 위해서, 교내의 여러 커플들을 도와 주는 게 메인인 게임인 만큼, 정말 여러 커플들이 등장하는데 하나 같이 다들 너무 매력적이었습니다. 이 사람들이라면 분명 백년 해로를 할 수 있을 거라고 믿어 의심치 않습니다.

그리고 주인공을 비롯한 캐릭터들의 성장도 정말 좋았어요.

예전에 이게 성인게임이긴 해도 그렇게 큰 의미가 없을 정도라는 얘기를 들어서 정말 그런 줄 알았는데
생각했던 것 보다 훨씬 더 본격적인 섹스신이 나와서 이게 세상에 진짜 어떻게 그걸 그렇게 이런 아니 진짜로?

아아아아아

빨리 드라마 CD 들으러 가야겠습니다. 다른 이야기가 너무 궁금해.

author: {'steamid': '76561198875728994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1292, 'last_played': 1628267801}
review:
A friend bought me this game for Christmas. I would personally buy it too even if my friend didn't buy it for me. All the CGs are voiced and the characters are just so lovable. The art is nice and there are heartwarming scenes and so many cute yuri moments that will make you scream internally and roll on your bed like a crazy fangirl. It is easy to move around since it automatically saves the progress with the planner and you can go back to it anytime. I am totally in love with it and it is just the best and very wholesome. It is a bit vanilla but isn't really cliched in terms of plot and drama. ALL HAIL YURITOPIA!!!!!!
(The only flaw I'd say is that sometimes Miyu's voice sound a bit like a robot but it is fine since she do speak normally at times)

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198373023047', 'num_games_owned': 1119, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1578145401}

author: {'steamid': '76561198330772594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1610, 'last_played': 1609911422}
review:
在收集完小熊，吃完所有樱桃和苹果后，稍微带点不舍和残念。

一是游戏就这么结束了，多少有点不舍。
仅是打折时40块入的，价格并不是多么贵，不过抱着稍微试一试的心态和对骗子社的景仰，便买下了这部美妙的百合游戏。画面的风格已经可以说是完全对的上我的胃口，不华丽也不单调，卡在一个正好的位置，看起来很舒心。音乐的质量也挺不错，但在玩的时间稍微长一点后，发觉到音乐数量是不是太少了点？一段剧情看下来都被一首曲子洗脑半天。

就剧情而言，不带杂质也不带喂屎成分，也并非像一般萌豚百合的GAL一般仅凭着所谓的充满着“可愛さ”的女孩子的卿卿我我来博取女同爱好者的喜欢，起码我是这么认为的；
沙纱&羽美
美夕&茉莉
牧&美纪
阳香&爱来
小月代&桐
无论那一对的百合故事都是基于双方互相了解，并深刻认识对方，可以说是非常正经且又有趣的故事。
[spoiler]那个闪光大作战真是闪瞎眼 [/spoiler]
日历形式的故事推进方法既能在完成主线的时候也能同一时期完成支线，也省下了不停SKIP存档来来回回的麻烦。
虽然这部百合灵有着steam上唯一一部无删减r18游戏的说法，不过充其也就是个噱头，可能是这种程度已经到了不删也无所谓了么？（笑）最多也就是亲亲和摸摸，而且还很短。
整个故事在跟着变为好好先生的结奈送走两位幽灵之后基本就是尾声了，才发现到，“啊，原来已经结束了。”有着这么一种感觉，每次听结奈吧啦吧啦讲一大堆和料理相关的话题的都觉得非常有趣。
虽然把之后还有小苹果的事完全忘了，应该说根本不知道更恰当。


二是，为什么前期给个FLAG让我选插阿野还是比奈，为毛最后结局只有一个?
比奈这声线以及其和结奈的相貌差让我最初一度以为这是高中生姐姐和初中生妹妹在进行对话，一段马铃薯削出情，看到结奈对比奈开始动摇的时候可真把我快吓傻了。。
[spoiler] 为什么？なぜ？WHY？为什么不是阿野！? [/spoiler]
结合外传剧情，我对阿野的好感度甚至超过了之前一直很喜欢的结奈，但没有阿野支线也太过残忍了，各种意义上来说。
[spoiler] なんで、こんなにかわい子があるの！？ [/spoiler]
结果这也变成了这部游戏唯一的残念所在。
[spoiler] 实际在游戏初期，我甚至都不认为结奈会和阿野结上“恋爱”缘，或者说就算有可能也是比较小概率，考虑到游戏中好几个选项询问结奈（玩家）关于同性恋的认知和看法，玩的前期我都笃定结局可能是结奈通过撮合几对情侣改变了自己对同性恋的看法，并也开始与身边的人产生交集，也能够对自己身边的同性朋友们敞开心扉，并非一定是以和阿野恋爱为结局，但之后发现结局居然是和比奈恋爱的时候，我！? [/spoiler]

不过总的来说这也是一部挺好的百合游戏，基本上也是我接触的第一部百合向游戏，在这百合乡呆久了，感觉整个人都快被同化了，之前甚至有为“城女”这所女校里为什么一个男人都没有这种诡异的问题纳闷，第一次看到阳香还以为是个男的然后大惊失色，然后之后又被打脸。。。
果然这就是百合无限好，不生也挺好么。

author: {'steamid': '76561198195770442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3559, 'last_played': 1706715403}
review:
This VN has so much fun, tension, and emotions packed into a quirky yet heartwarming visual Novel.
When I first played this I enjoyed the story a hell of a lot, and then I played it again after getting the full chorus DLC and boy was it worth it. I can honestly say the each character's VA was chosen perfectly and just fit so well, and made it so immersive that it was often hard to stop playing.
Please, if you enjoy Visual Novels, and if you enjoy Yuri as a genre, pick up this game and the full chorus DLC, you will not regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082952274', 'num_games_owned': 900, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1576944533}
review:
My life for [strike]Auir[/strike] Yuritopia!

这才是我喜欢的清水百合啊！

整体而言是一部较为轻松的百合Gal[strike]比Flowers 春强多了[/strike]。游戏采用了日历的组织形式，同时采用了多POV叙事视角，同一件事可以通过不同人的角度重新体验，还算有趣。剧情不弱智，不怎么媚宅，人物塑造优秀，算上主角一共7对情侣16人（包括两个无恋爱要素的姬友角色），每个人都有自己的个性丝毫不重复，直到现在我也能在脑海中回忆出每个人的特点。最喜欢的一组是摇滚组合，笨蛋与夹击妹抖的组合让我微妙地有一种在看睡觉的笨蛋的错觉，虽然喜爱摇滚的人反了过来，而且我觉得Live那段的演出实在是本篇演出之最了（毕竟这个gal基本没啥演出可言……）。第二喜欢的大概就是圣女与骑士组了，学妹爆发那里声优的演绎真是令人感动。

剧情：日常系百合加上少许的超自然设定（毕竟有幽灵），有些小幽默，不至于太无聊，也不至于出戏。在主角与屋顶的两位百合灵搭话之前，她们已经分别在这个学校呆了30和60年了，所以自然也会让故事带上些许的孤寂感。当幽灵们附身在主角上，用不属于自己的嘴品尝着60年未曾接触过的可乐的味道时，温馨中也有一丝的哀伤。不过故事整体还是比较轻松且积极的，比较适合被现实蹂躏后寻找桃源乡时使用。

画风：我挺喜欢这种画风的，虽然简单但是有着微妙的清新感，具体画风可以通过商店画面看到，各位见仁见智吧。

音乐：还行，就是基本只有几首来回播放，听多了有些疲劳，不过阳香的那个Live很有临场感，我吹爆。

系统：一般般吧，运行时间长了以后会有卡顿的bug，不过不太影响游戏进行。

HScene：没多大意思，不太建议为了这种内容购买。

对了，我对于没有阿野线表示强烈不满，和妹妹只是家人的关系，宅女阿野才是真爱啊！

还有，通关后记得每天的主线选项换着选一下，可以解锁新的附加剧情，附加剧情全部解锁完毕后会解锁通关纪念语音。

顺便，汉化补丁：https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404330613380376839#_0
转载自夢奶茶Sampuli的评测：https://steamcommunity.com/id/MilkTeaSampuli/recommended/402620/

author: {'steamid': '76561197973419195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1322, 'last_played': 1602338958}
review:
This game blew me away, honestly. In a romance-based work of fiction, I'm primarily looking for depictions of somewhat realistic romantic relationships (starting at friendship and going up through steady dating) between women. I was pretty sure this game was going to be incompatible with those ideas.

I've been sort of afraid of picking up a game like this before - partially because I worried my Steam friends would silently judge me for this (they still will, but I've accepted this burden) and partially because I felt like there wasn't a real chance that I would enjoy it. One of the big issues for me is that I feel uncomfortable in romance games that are overburdened with player choice. While this is a positive feature for many, I don't really want to roleplay with myself being the protagonist of the relationships. I simply enjoy watching other characters experience relationships, so it makes me feel awkward when a game tries to force me into the position of controlling every little detail of the plot. Thankfully, Kindred Spirits on the Roof never made me feel this way (partially due to the fantastic and interesting protagonist, whose actions feel very independent from the player for the most part). The other big issue I often have with romance-based games is fanservice - panty shots, accidental boob grabs, etc. I find those types of antics to be inherently incompatible with my concept of romance. There is none of that at all in this game.

The biggest problem that a Yuri romance work (in any format) has to tackle is the level of seriousness or reality to put into the work. It's such an incredibly fine line to walk, partially because everyone has different tastes. Some people like there to be absolutely zero conflict of any kind - pure and fluffy relationships where everyone is always happy. Others actually want to see the brutal reality and struggle with social stigmas that a homosexual couple would have to endure in order to survive. Some others enjoy a normal level of relationship challenges, where conflicts center primarily around uncertain futures, misunderstandings, or other love interests.

I feel that Kindred Spirits on the Roof strikes exactly the right balance between these different levels of seriousness, at least for me. The societal issues with homosexual relationships are mentioned but are only a true hurdle for very few of the couples in the game. The other couples all have problems of varying levels of seriousness with a whole host of different reasons behind them. I believe the idea was to vary as many circumstances between the couples as possible in order to broaden the range of romantic experiences that the game can showcase. Some of the relationships are mutual love from the start of the game, and others are one-sided initially. One forms in a set of three friends, one forms around an after-school club, and one forms out of disciplinary action of all things. The variety of the characters also comes out in the character design; all of the characters are pretty different looking in terms of hair color, height, face structure, and clothing choices.

There's only a few real cons I can mention for the game, and none are something I consider a real issue. First, the level of naivete shown by the characters regarding sex is unbelievable (literally). These girls are in Japan's equivalent to high school (several of them in the final year of high school), so the idea that not a single couple in the game realizes how two girls can make love is pretty absurd, which can throw a reader out of the experience sometimes. I know that it's cute that they struggle to express their feelings as a result of their lack of understanding, but it did stick out to me here more than usual. Second, if constant plot twists are very important to you, you may not enjoy this game (there's lots of other VN options for that though). While there certainly are some surprises, they aren't earth-shattering ones, and most readers with a keen sense of deduction are probably going to guess pretty quickly who is going to end up with who and how most conflicts will be resolved. Last is not a con but a warning: there's sex scenes in this game. They feature partial nudity (i.e. breasts) and, at least with the 'Full Chorus' DLC (not sure without it), are fully voiced (i.e. expect lewd moaning). Also, the premise of the game has to do with the ghosts wanting to watch people have sex at school so they can figure out how to do it. I didn't personally mind any of this and knew what I was getting into because of the content warnings present on this Steam store page, though I'll mention that I thought the premise was really weird (see point #1 in this paragraph regarding believability) especially since the ghosts have had -30 years- to figure things out before this.

The weirdest thing about this game is that I have very specific tastes, and this game almost perfectly matches them. The game basically feels like it was made specifically for me. So, I guess if you are also me (or can emphasize with some of the preferences I've expressed in this review), then you will enjoy the game greatly too.

review:
Probably one of the best yuri visual novel story ive ever read.

And yes, it would probably helpful to think this as  a literal visual novel instead of a "game" because how little you control the narration.

Unlike other VN where it can give you alternate route and alternate pairing for your character , this one has pretty much set all the pair in stone. You just reading how it gets there.

Understandably, this can be a deal-breaker to some people. However if you can look all past that this VN has one of the better lesbian romance Ive ever read. Sure the theme itself may not provide anything new. But the way they are written are truly enjoyable and really makes this game. 

REally recommend this VN. Just, set your mind a little bit before you "play" it  8/10
